content: कालीयकः, --कं {@--1@} A species of aloe wood. {@--2@} A kind of turmeric. {@--3@} Yellow sandal. {@--4@} A dark kind of sandal wood. {@--5@} Saffron; <ls>Śi. 12. 14.</ls>
